debates.showAs: Public Health (Antacid Products) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: An Act to provide, in respect of antacid products sold or otherwise supplied, for warning notices to be displayed where such products are sold or otherwise supplied and so sold or supplied other than solely by way of wholesale, to provide for the failure to display such a notice, to provide for authorised officers and their functions and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú, i leith táirgí frithaigéid a dhíoltar nó a sholáthraítear ar shlí eile, maidir le fógraí rabhaidh a chur ar taispeáint in áiteanna ina ndíoltar na táirgí sin nó ina soláthraítear ar shlí eile iad, agus ina ndíoltar nó ina soláthraítear amhlaidh iad seachas ar mhodh mórdhíola amháin, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le mainneachtain a dhéanamh fógra den sórt sin a chur ar taispeáint, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le hoifigigh údaraithe agus maidir lena bhfeidhmeanna agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Bail (Amendment) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Schedule to the Bail Act 1997 so as to include a reference to an offence under section 39 of the Domestic Violence Act 2018 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Sceidil a ghabhann leis an Acht um Bannaí, 1997 chun tagairt do chion faoi alt 39 den Acht um Fhoréigean Baile, 2018 a áireamh agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Protection of Children (Online Age Verification) Bill 2024: Second Stage
Protection of Children (Online Age Verification) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act, in the interest of child protection, to require that access to pornographic material on the internet be subject to an age-verification requirement and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht, ar mhaithe le cosaint leanaí, dá cheangal go mbeidh rochtain ar ábhar pornagrafach ar an idirlíon faoi réir ceanglas fíoraithe aoise agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Protection of Children (Online Age Verification) Bill 2024
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chosaint Leanaí (Fíorú Aoise ar Líne), 2024

debates.showAs: Health (Scoliosis Treatment Services) Bill 2024: Report and Final Stages
Health (Scoliosis Treatment Services) Bill 2024: Committee Stage
Health (Scoliosis Treatment Services) Bill 2024: Second Stage
Health (Scoliosis Treatment Services) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to impose on the Health Service Executive certain special duties and powers in relation to the establishment of a specialised treatment service for the inpatient and outpatient treatment of children and adults of spinal scoliosis who are resident in the State and to confer certain duties and powers on the Minister for Health in relation to the service to be established and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht d’fhorchur dualgais agus cumhachtaí speisialta áirithe ar Fheidhmeannacht na Seirbhíse Sláinte i ndáil le sainseirbhís cóireála a bhunú chun cóireáil d’othar cónaithe agus d’othar seachtrach a chur ar leanaí agus ar dhaoine fásta a bhfuil scolóis dromlaigh orthu agus a bhfuil cónaí orthu sa Stát agus do thabhairt dualgais agus cumhachtaí áirithe don Aire Sláinte i ndáil leis an tseirbhís a bheidh le bunú agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Domestic Violence (Amendment) (No. 2) Bill 2024: Second Stage
Domestic Violence (Amendment) (No. 2) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Domestic Violence Act 2018 by means of extending the restrictions on those present in courtroom proceedings, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Fhoréigean Baile, 2018 trí na srianta a bheidh orthu siúd a bheidh i láthair in imeachtaí i seomra cúirte a leathnú, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Safety, Health and Welfare at Work (Formaldehyde) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Safety, Health and Welfare at Work Act 2005 to require the Health and Safety Authority to prepare and publish a code of practice under section 60 of that Act in respect of the safe use and disposal of formaldehyde, with particular reference to the embalming process; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Shábháilteacht, Sláinte agus Leas ag an Obair, 2005 chun a cheangal ar an Údarás Sláinte agus Sábháilteachta cód cleachtais a ullmhú agus a fhoilsiú faoi alt 60 den Acht sin maidir le húsáid shábháilte agus diúscairt shábháilte formaildéid, ag tagairt go háirithe do phróiseas an bhalsamaithe; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Safety, Health and Welfare at Work (Formaldehyde) Bill 2024
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Shábháilteacht, Sláinte agus Leas ag an Obair (Formaildéad), 2024

debates.showAs: Special Measures in the Public Interest (Derrybrien Wind Farm) Bill 2023: Second Stage
Special Measures in the Public Interest (Derrybrien Wind Farm) Bill 2023: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act, in the public interest, to assist in maintaining the security of the electricity supply system in the State, and for that purpose to provide for the transfer to the western development commission of the Derrybrien wind farm; to effect the transfer of shares in Gort Windfarms Limited to the Western Development Commission; to provide for the removal of persons from certain offices positions or employment with Gort wind farms limited and provide for the appointment of persons to those offices or positions or that employment; to extinguish certain rights; to provide for the re-naming of Gort Wind Farms Limited; to provide for the transfer of the lessee’s interest in the lands at Derrybrien; to disapply certain provisions of the Companies Acts and other enactments in so far as they relate to Gort wind farms limited; to provide for the preservation of contracts; to provide for the making of regulations; and to provide for connected matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht, ar mhaithe le leas an phobail, chun cabhrú le slándáil an tsoláthair leictreachais sa Stát a chothabháil agus, chun na críche sin, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le Feirm Ghaoithe Dharaidh Braoin a aistriú chuig Coimisiún Forbartha an Iarthair; do dhéanamh scaireanna in Gort Windfarms Limited a aistriú chuig Coimisiún Forbartha an Iarthair; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le daoine a chur as oifigí, poist nó fostaíocht áirithe le Gort Windfarms Limited agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir le daoine a cheapadh chun na n-oifigí nó na bpost nó na fostaíochta sin; do mhúchadh cearta áirithe; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le Gort Windfarms Limited a athainmniú; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le leas an léasaí sna tailte i nDaraidh Braoin a aistriú; do dhéanamh forálacha áirithe d’Achtanna na gCuideachtaí agus d’achtacháin eile a dhífheidhmiú a mhéid a bhaineann siad le Gort Windfarms Limited; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le conarthaí a choimeád ar marthain; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le rialacháin a dhéanamh; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe comhghaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Special Measures in the Public Interest (Derrybrien Wind Farm) Bill 2023
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Bearta Speisialta ar mhaithe le Leas an Phobail (Feirm Ghaoithe Dharaidh Braoin), 2023

debates.showAs: Disability (Miscellaneous Provisions) Bill 2023: Report and Final Stages
Disability (Miscellaneous Provisions) Bill 2023: Committee Stage
Disability (Miscellaneous Provisions) Bill 2023: Second Stage
Disability (Miscellaneous Provisions) Bill 2023: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Disability Act 2005 and the Equal Status Act 2000 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Míchumas, 2005 agus an Achta um Stádas Comhionann, 2000 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Gradam an Uachtaráin Bill 2023: Order for Second Stage
Gradam an Uachtaráin Bill 2023: Second Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to facilitate the conferral by the State of an honour to be known as Gradam an Uachtaráin to recognise the exceptional achievements of its citizens and the outstanding contributions of others; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht d’éascú don Stát onóir a bhronnadh ar a dtabharfar Gradam an Uachtaráin chun éachtaí eisceachtúla a saoránach agus cion oibre suntasach daoine eile, a aithint; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Civil Liability (Schools) Bill 2023: Order for Second Stage
Civil Liability (Schools) Bill 2023: Second Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the law related to civil liability for schools.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an dlí a bhaineann le dliteanas sibhialta i leith scoileanna.

debates.showAs: Planning and Development (Built Heritage Protection) Bill 2022: Second Stage
Planning and Development (Built Heritage Protection) Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend and extend the Planning and Development Acts 2000 to 2021 to improve the level of protection afforded to Ireland’s built heritage, to prescribe the role of architectural conservation officers, to strengthen the protection afforded by architectural conservation area designation, to increase the enforcement mechanisms and penalties for breaches of planning legislation resulting in damage to built heritage and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú agus do leathnú na nAchtanna um Pleanáil agus Forbairt, 2000 go 2021 chun an leibhéal cosanta a thugtar d’oidhreacht thógtha na hÉireann a fheabhsú, d’fhorordú ról oifigeach caomhantais ailtireachta, do neartú na cosanta a thugtar le sainainmniú  mar limistéar caomhantais ailtireachta, do mhéadú na sásraí forfheidhmiúcháin agus na bpionós i leith sáruithe ar an reachtaíocht phleanála a mbeidh damáiste d’oidhreacht thógtha de thoradh orthu agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Planning and Development (Built Heritage Protection) Bill 2022
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Pleanáil agus Forbairt (Cosaint Oidhreachta Tógtha), 2022

debates.showAs: Protection of the Native Irish Honey Bee Bill 2021: Report and Final Stages
Protection of the Native Irish Honey Bee Bill 2021: Committee Stage
Protection of the Native Irish Honey Bee Bill 2021: Second Stage
Protection of the Native Irish Honey Bee Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to ban the importation of non-native honey bees with the aim of reducing the threat to and adverse impact upon biodiversity and the ecosystem arising from the introgression/crossing/cross-breeding of the native Irish Honey Bee, Apis mellifera mellifera, due to the importation of non-native species or sub-species of and/or strains derived from Apis mellifera and to provide for the appointment of authorised officers; to make it an offence to forge an animal health certificate; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do chur cosc le beacha nach beacha meala dúchasacha Éireannacha a allmhairiú, d’fhonn laghdú a dhéanamh ar an mbagairt, agus ar an drochthionchar, ar an mbithéagsúlacht agus ar an éiceachóras a eascraíonn as ionghabháil/crosáil/crosphórú na Beiche Meala dúchasaí Éireannaí, Apis mellifera mellifera, mar gheall ar allmhairiú speiceas neamhdhúchasach nó fospeiceas d’Apis mellifera agus/nó tréithchineálacha a dhíorthaíonn as Apis mellifera agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir le hoifigigh údaraithe a cheapadh; do dhéanamh cion de dheimhniú um shláinte ainmhí a bhrionnú; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Protection of the Native Irish Honey Bee Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um an mBeach Mheala Dhúchasach Éireannach a Chosaint, 2021

debates.showAs: Registration of Wills Bill 2021: Second Stage
Registration of Wills Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the extension of the Civil Registration Service to the registration of certain information regarding wills and for those purposes to revise the law relating to the Civil Registration Service and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir leis an tSeirbhís um Chlárú Sibhialta a leathnú chuig clárú faisnéise áirithe maidir le huachtanna agus chun na gcríoch sin d'athmheas an dlí a bhaineann leis an tSeirbhís um Chlárú Sibhialta agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

act.longTitleEn: Act to amend the Children Act 2001 to make further provision, in relation to proceedings to which section 252 of that Act applies, in respect of the publication and inclusion in a broadcast of reports or pictures identifying or likely to identify certain children; and to provide for related matters.
act.longTitleGa: Acht do leasú Acht na Leanaí, 2001 chun socrú breise a dhéanamh, i ndáil le himeachtaí lena mbaineann alt 252 den Acht sin, i leith tuairiscí nó pictiúir a fhoilsiú agus a áireamh i gcraoladh, is tuairiscí nó pictiúir lena ndéanfar, nó lenar dóigh go ndéanfaí, leanaí áirithe a chéannú; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

amendmentList.showAs: Cream List [Dáil amendments to Seanad Bill]

debates.showAs: Children (Amendment) Bill 2020: [Seanad Bill amended by the Dáil] Report and Final Stages
Children (Amendment) Bill 2020 [Seanad]: Committee and Remaining Stages
Children (Amendment) Bill 2020 [Seanad]: Second Stage (Resumed)
Children (Amendment) Bill 2020 [Seanad]: Second Stage
Children (Amendment) Bill 2020: Report and Final Stages
Children (Amendment) Bill 2020: Committee Stage
Children (Amendment) Bill 2020: Second Stage
Children (Amendment) Bill 2020: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Children Act 2001 to make further provision, in relation to proceedings to which section 252 of that Act applies, in respect of the publication and inclusion in a broadcast of reports or pictures identifying or likely to identify certain children; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú Acht na Leanaí, 2001 chun socrú breise a dhéanamh, i ndáil le himeachtaí lena mbaineann alt 252 den Acht sin, i leith tuairiscí nó pictiúir a fhoilsiú agus a áireamh i gcraoladh, is tuairiscí nó pictiúir lena ndéanfar, nó lenar dóigh go ndéanfaí, leanaí áirithe a chéannú; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Seanad Bill 2020: Second Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to reform Seanad Éireann within the terms of the Constitution and for that purpose to expand the franchise at Seanad elections; to provide for the establishment of the Seanad Electoral Commission; to provide for the repeal of the Seanad Electoral (Panel Members) Act 1947 and the Seanad Electoral (University Members) Act 1937, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht d’athleasú Sheanad Éireann faoi réim théarmaí an Bhunreachta agus, chun na críche sin, do leathnú an toghchórais i gcás thoghcháin an tSeanaid; do dhéanamh socrú maidir leis an gCoimisiún um Thoghcháin an tSeanaid a bhunú; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le hAcht Toghcháin an tSeanaid (Rolla-Chomhaltaí), 1947 agus Acht Toghacháin an tSeanaid (Baill Phríomh-Scoile), 1937 a aisghairm, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: National Screening Advisory Committee Bill 2020: Second Stage
National Screening Advisory Committee Bill 2020: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the establishment of a body, to be known in the Irish language as an Coiste Comhairleach Náisiúnta um Braitheoireacht or in the English language as the National Screening Advisory Committee, to advise on the operation of health screening programmes in the State and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le comhlacht a bhunú, ar a dtabharfar, sa Ghaeilge, an Coiste Comhairleach Náisiúnta um Braitheoireacht nó, sa Bhéarla, the National Screening Advisory Committee, chun comhairle a thabhairt maidir le hoibriú clár braitheoireachta sláinte sa Stát agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille fá Choiste Comhairleach Náisiúnta um Braitheoireacht, 2020

debates.showAs: Civil Liability (Schools) Bill 2019: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the law related to civil liability for schools.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an dlí a bhaineann le dliteanas sibhialta i leith scoileanna.

debates.showAs: Education (Digital Devices in Schools) Bill 2018: Order for Second Stage
Education (Digital Devices in Schools) Bill 2018: Second Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to regulate the use of digital devices in primary and secondary schools subject to the discretionary educational uses provided for in the act and to put in place a code of behaviour on digital device usage implemented by the board of management and teachers by which student possession of digital devices will be prohibited during school hours for the purposes of reducing the harmful impact on academic performance and the social and emotional wellbeing of children.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do rialáil úsáid feistí digiteacha i mbunscoileanna agus i meánscoileanna faoi réir na n-úsáidí lánroghnacha oideachais dá bhforáiltear san Acht agus do chur cód iompair ar bun maidir le feistí digiteacha a úsáid a bheidh le cur i ngníomh ag an mbord bainistíochta agus ag múinteoirí lena dtoirmiscfear feistí digiteacha a bheith i seilbh mac léinn le linn uaireanta scoile chun an tionchar dochrach ar fheidhmíocht acadúil agus ar dhea-bhail shóisialta agus mhothúchánach leanaí a laghdú.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Oideachais (Feistí Digiteacha i Scoileanna), 2018

debates.showAs: Local Government Accountability Bill 2018: Second Stage
Local Government Accountability Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for better replies and response times from local authority officials to local representative queries
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le freagraí níos fearr ó oifigigh údaráis áitiúil agus agaí freagartha níos fearr ag oifigigh údaráis áitiúil i ndáil le ceisteanna ó ionadaithe áitiúla.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chuntasacht Rialtais Áitiúil, 2018

debates.showAs: Prohibition of Conversion Therapies Bill 2018: Second Stage
Prohibition of Conversion Therapies Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to prohibit conversion therapy, as a deceptive and harmful act or practice against a person's sexual orientation, gender identity and, or gender expression.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do thoirmeasc teiripe thiontúcháin mar ghníomh nó cleachtas meabhlach agus dochrach in aghaidh gnéaschlaonadh, féiniúlacht inscne agus/nó léiriú inscne duine.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thoirmeasc ar Theiripí Tiontúcháin, 2018

debates.showAs: Defence (Veterans Lapel Badge) Bill 2017: Second Stage
Defence (Veterans Lapel Badge) Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the establishment of a veterans lapel badge to be conferred upon former members of the Army, Air Corps, Naval Service and Reserve Defence Forces
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le suaitheantas liopa iarshaighdiúra a chur ar fáil lena bhronnadh ar iarchomhaltaí an Airm, an Aerchóir, na Seirbhíse Cabhlaigh agus na nÓglach Cúltaca

debates.showAs: National Housing Co-operative Bill 2017: Second Stage
National Housing Co-operative Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the establishment of an industrial and provident society to be called the National Housing Co-operative Society with the mandate and powers to acquire, manage, rent or sell distressed mortgages so that the occupants of houses can move from the status of distressed mortgagor by means of mortgage to "rent and mortgage"
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cumann tionscail agus soláthair a bhunú ar a dtabharfar an Comharchumann Tithíochta Náisiúnta agus ag a mbeidh an sainordú agus na cumhachtaí chun morgáistí tochsail a fháil, a bhainistiú, a ligean ar cíos nó a dhíol ionas gur féidir le háititheoirí tithe aistriú ó stádas morgáisteora tochsail trí mhorgáiste go "cíos agus morgáiste"
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chomharchumann Tithíochta Náisiúnta, 2017

debates.showAs: Controlled Drugs and Harm Reduction Bill 2017: Order for Second Stage
Controlled Drugs and Harm Reduction Bill 2017: Second Stage
Controlled Drugs and Harm Reduction Bill 2017: Second Stage (Resumed)

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Misuse of Drugs Acts 1977-2016 to provide for the decriminalisation for possession of controlled drugs for personal use and to provide for regulations regarding personal use; to establish a Drug Dissuasion Service to case-manage persons found in possession of controlled drugs and to divert people away from the courts by providing a system of harm reduction measures including drug awareness, drug rehabilitation and community engagement programmes; and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú na nAchtanna um Mí-Úsáid Drugaí, 1977 go 2016 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le díchoiriúlú a dhéanamh ar shealbhú drugaí rialaithe chun úsáide pearsanta agus chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le rialacháin a bhaineann le húsáid phearsanta; do bhunú Seirbhís Athchomhairliúcháin Drugaí chun daoine a bhfaightear drugaí rialaithe ina seilbh a chásbhainistiú agus chun daoine a athstiúradh ó na cúirteanna trí chóras de bhearta laghdaithe dochair a sholáthar, lena n-áirítear feasacht i leith drugaí, athshlánúchán ó dhrugaí agus cláir rannpháirtíochta pobail; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleEn: Controlled Drugs and Harm Reduction Bill 2017
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Dhrugaí Rialaithe agus um Dhochar a Laghdú, 2017

act.longTitleEn: Act to amend the Licensing Acts 1833 to 2011 and to provide for related matters.
act.longTitleGa: Acht do leasú na nAchtanna Ceadúnúcháin, 1833 go 2011, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Intoxicating Liquor (Amendment) Bill 2017 [Seanad]: Second and Subsequent Stages
Intoxicating Liquor (Amendment) Bill 2017: Committee and Remaining Stages
Intoxicating Liquor (Amendment) Bill 2017: Second Stage
Intoxicating Liquor (Amendment) Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Licensing Acts 1833 to 2011 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú na nAchtanna Ceadúnúcháin, 1833 go 2011, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Minimum Custodial Periods upon Conviction for Murder Bill 2017: Second Stage (Resumed)
Minimum Custodial Periods upon Conviction for Murder Bill 2017: Second Stage (Resumed)
Minimum Custodial Periods upon Conviction for Murder Bill 2017: Second Stage
Minimum Custodial Periods upon Conviction for Murder Bill 2017: Second Stage (Resumed)
Minimum Custodial Periods upon Conviction for Murder Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the adoption of a system of minimum custodial periods upon conviction in cases of murder whereby the court shall determine the minimum custodial term a person convicted of the offence of murder shall serve, based on the circumstances of the matter before the court, and where the court shall give reasons for such a determination
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le córas tréimhsí íosta faoi choimeád a ghlacadh ar chiontú i gcásanna dúnmharaithe, trína gcinnfidh an chúirt an téarma íosta faoi choimeád a chuirfidh duine, a chiontófar sa chion arb éard é dúnmharú, isteach, bunaithe ar imthosca an ábhair a bheidh os comhair na cúirte, agus trína dtabharfaidh an chúirt cúiseanna le cinneadh den sórt sin
bill.shortTitleEn: Minimum Custodial Periods upon Conviction for Murder Bill 2017
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thréimhsí Íosta faoi Choimeád ar Chiontú i nDúnmharú, 2017

debates.showAs: Mental Health (Amendment) Bill 2016: Report and Final Stages
Mental Health (Amendment) Bill 2016: Committee Stage
Mental Health (Amendment) Bill 2016: Second Stage
Mental Health (Amendment) Bill 2016: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide that all children must be admitted to child appropriate inpatient psychiatric units and providing that no child shall be admitted to an adult psychiatric inpatient unit (voluntarily or involuntarily) save in exceptional circumstances where such admission is in the child's best interests
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú gur gá gach leanbh a ligean isteach in aonaid shíciatracha d'othair chónaithe atá cuí le haghaidh leanaí agus do dhéanamh socrú nach ligfear aon leanbh isteach in aonad síciatrach d'othair chónaithe le haghaidh aosach (dá dheoin nó dá deoin, nó dá ainneoin nó dá hainneoin) ach amháin in imthosca eisceachtúla inarb é leas an linbh é an ligean isteach sin a dhéanamh

debates.showAs: Public Bodies Review Agency Bill 2016: Second Stage
Public Bodies Review Agency Bill 2016: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to establish a body to be known as An Ghníomhaireacht Athbhreithnithe Comhlachtaí Poiblí, or in the English language as the Public Bodies Review Agency, conferred with the necessary powers and functions and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do bhunú comhlacht ar a dtabharfar an Ghníomhaireacht Athbhreithnithe Comhlachtaí Poiblí nó, sa Bhéarla, the Public Bodies Review Agency, dá dtugtar na cumhachtaí agus na feidhmeanna is gá agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um an nGníomhaireacht Athbhreithnithe Comhlachtaí Poiblí, 2016

debates.showAs: Immigration (Reform) (Regularisation of Residency Status) Bill 2016: Second Stage
Immigration (Reform) (Regularisation of Residency Status) Bill 2016: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the regularisation of the residency status of persons who have applied for refugee status and/or subsidiary protection if four years following the submission of such an application the application remains undetermined and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le stádas cónaithe daoine a mbeidh iarratas ar stádas dídeanaí agus/nó ar chosaint fhoghabhálach déanta acu a thabhairt chun rialtachta más rud é, ceithre bliana tar éis iarratas den sórt sin a chur isteach, go mbeidh cinneadh fós gan déanamh i leith an iarratais, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Inimirce (Athchóiriú) (Stádas Cónaithe a Thabhairt chun Rialtachta), 2016

debates.showAs: Seanad Bill 2016: Second Stage (Resumed)
Seanad Bill 2016: Second Stage
Seanad Bill 2016: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to implement reforms proposed in the Report of the Working Group on Seanad Reform and for that purpose to effect a range of reforms to the Seanad, to provide for the establishment of a Seanad Electoral Commission and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht chun athchóirithe a mholtar sa Tuarascáil ón nGasra Oibre um Athchóiriú an tSeanaid a chur i ngníomh agus chun na críche sin do dhéanamh réimse athchóirithe ar an Seanad, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le Coimisiún um Thoghcháin an tSeanaid a bhunú agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara

debates.showAs: Regulation of Drones Bill 2016: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to regulate the use of drones having due regard for public safety, the privacy rights of individuals including rights of privacy attaching to the ownership of private property and for that purpose to provide for a system of registration and licensing which is dependent upon the power of the drone; to provide for a knowledge test to be taken by the owners of drones which exceed a certain size; to require drones to be insured; to set out general and specific principles on the safe operation of drones; to require that certain drones be affixed with a code which makes it identifiable; to provide for a drone reporting service; to require mandatory reporting of drone loss; to provide for the seizure of drones; to provide for the establishment of a working group to develop new policy relating to the commercial use of drones; and to make it an offence to contravene provisions of this Bill.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do rialáil úsáid drón agus aird chuí á tabhairt ar shábháilteacht an phobail, ar chearta príobháideachta pearsan aonair, lena n-áirítear cearta príobháideachta a ghabhann le húinéireacht maoine príobháidí agus chun na críche sin do dhéanamh socrú maidir le córas clárúcháin agus ceadúnúcháin atá ag brath ar chumhacht an dróin; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le tástáil eolais faoina rachaidh úinéirí drón ar mó iad ná méid áirithe; dá cheangal dróin a bheith árachaithe; do leagan amach prionsabail ghinearálta agus sonracha maidir le hoibriú sábháilte drón; dá cheangal cód a ghreamú de dhróin áirithe chun go mbeidh sé inaitheanta; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le seirbhís tuairiscithe drón; dá cheangal tuairisciú sainordaitheach faoi chailleadh drón; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le dróin a urghabháil; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le gasra oibre a bhunú chun beartas nua a fhorbairt maidir le húsáid tráchtála drón; agus do dhéanamh cion de shárú fhorálacha an Bhille seo.
